definitions.title: vb. Hithp.
definitions.body: be perplexed (Targum id., entangle, beguile, NH [[שָׁבַשׁ]] confuse, disarrange; cf. As. šabâšu (šabasu), turn about; Syr. 4abeq flatter, allure, Schulth:Hom. Wurz. 90; so Mand. Pa. [[שבש]] Nö:M 49; cf. Ar. 4aw=a4a (as loan-word Nö:l. c.) confuse);—Pt. pl. [[מִשְׁתַּבְּשִׁין]] Da 5:9.
